channel.title: OMG! WTF? Politics?!?
channel.description: A fun political podcast aimed at looking at some of the interesting and controversial things that happen in U.S. politics each week.
channel.copyright: Copyright OMG! WTF? Politics?!?, 2009. All rights reserved.
channel.itunes:author: OMG! WTF? Politics?!?
channel.itunes:summary: A podcast where I review political happenings each week in a fun way that's easy to grasp, and with lots of fun invective, for good measure!
channel.itunes:subtitle: A fun political podcast looking at U.S. politics each week.

item.title: Episode 5
item.description: OMG! WTF? Politics?!? - Back from Thanksgiving week off, and this week we're talking about some really awesome Tea Party Americans and patriots, revisiting 9/11, and the decision of President Obama to send 30,000 more troops into Afghanistan.
item.itunes:author: OMG! WTF? Politics?!?

item.title: Episode 3
item.description: Up for discussion this week are my mom, AIG, burqas, government jobs for you, private military contractors, and mortgage loan modifications.
item.itunes:author: OMG! WTF? Politics?!?
item.itunes:summary: Up for discussion this week are my mom, AIG, burqas, government jobs for you, private military contractors, and mortgage loan modifications.

item.title: OMG! WTF? Politics?!? episode 2
item.description: This week the gloves come off once again while we talk about the healthcare proposals of each party, the mid-midterm elections, another interesting kind of homeowner's insurance, and people who suck badly.
item.itunes:author: OMG! WTF? Politics?!?

item.title: OMG! WTF? Politics?!? episode 2
item.description: This week the gloves come off once again, as we talk about the healthcare bills of both parties, the mid-midterm elections, as well as a special kind of insurance, and complete assholes holding signs.

item.title: OMG! WTF? Politics?!? - Episode 1
item.description:
The first episode of OMG! WTF? Politics?!?
This episode includes introductions, health care protests, Terri Schiavo, people formerly known as "enemy combatants", and some healthy disdain for Fox News. Oh, and also some foul language.
